greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of A337372: a(n) = 1 if A337345(n) = 1, otherwise 0.
comment: Characteristic function of the primitive terms of A246282.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
formula: a(n) = [A337345(n) = 1], where [ ] is the Iverson bracket.
mathematica: f[1] = 1; f[n_] := Times @@ (NextPrime[#1]^#2 & @@@ FactorInteger[n]); a[n_] := Boole[DivisorSum[n, 1 &, f[#] > 2*# &] == 1]; Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Feb 22 2021 *)
program: A003961(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 22 2021
